I agree with Amonic. @godofwrath08 - YOU are the n00b. There ARE pc games with multiplayer available. I've downloaded some in the past. Not very many no, but they are out there. However, this torrent specifically, has no description whatsoever about what the torrent includes(single player, multiplayer, trailer, pics, etc.) and that's why I had asked. I'm too lazy to download a torrent and find out it's not worth it at the end.

When it is almost finished installing, I get "An error occurred while trying to copy a file: The source file is corrupted.  Click Retry to try again, Ignore to skip this file (not recommended), or Abort to cancel installation.  The file is dirextx\APR2007_d3dx9_33_x64.cab.
